document.full_text: indonesian volcano mount karangetang spewed hot clouds of ash and trapped up to 40 people between lava flows on its slopes friday as the government raised an alert for the peak to the highest level and evacuated villages.
document.title: indonesia volcano traps villagers between lava flows
lines_and_colors: indonesian volcano mount karangetang spewed hot clouds of ash and trapped up to 40 people between lava flows on its slopes friday as the government raised an alert for the peak to the highest level and evacuated villages.
